Title: Total Number of Active Users
Description: The number of unique addresses that were active as a sender of a successful transactions.

Title: Total Number of Blocks
Description: The total number of blocks created.

Title: Median Fees per Transaction [USD]
Description: The median amount of fees per transaction in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Transaction Fees [USD]
Description: The total amount of fees in U.S. dollars paid to conduct transactions.

Title: Total Number of Transactions
Description: The total number of transactions whether it has been successful or not.

Title: Total Swaps Volume [USD]
Description: The total volume of swaps in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Sales Volume [USD]
Description: The total volume of NFT sales in U.S. dollars.

Title: Total Sales Volume by Marketplace [USD]
Description: The total volume of NFT sales by each marketplace in U.S. dollars.
